snippet: Human rights groups questioned President Obama’s trip, saying that Ethiopia has silenced dissent with arbitrary arrests, mistreatment of detainees and repressive legislation.
abstract: Pres Obama will become first American president to visit Ethiopia when he meets with African Union leaders in July to discuss economic growth, improving security and strengthening democratic institutions.
lead_paragraph: Human rights groups questioned President Obama’s trip, saying that Ethiopia has silenced dissent with arbitrary arrests, mistreatment of detainees and repressive legislation.

headline.main: First Presidential Trip to Ethiopia Planned
headline.print_headline: First Presidential Trip to Ethiopia Planned
